module.name: StaticContentSample
module.param: This report provides details about the Citrix Licenses in your environment. Adjust the time range for this report by changing the timerange picker.

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `citrix_licensing` | `citrix_license_type` | `citrix_license_product` | rename Product as Prod | stats latest(ProductName) as Product latest(Installed) as Installed latest(Available) as Available latest(InUse_pct) as InUse_pct latest(TypeName) as Type earliest(*) as junk_* by InUse Prod _time | `remove_junk`

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | stats dc(Product) as count | eval classvalue="session"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | stats latest(InUse) as InUse earliest(InUse) as junk_InUse by Product | `remove_junk` | stats sum(InUse) as count | eval classvalue="user"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | stats latest(Available) as Available latest(InUse) as InUse earliest(*) as junk_* by Product | `remove_junk` | stats sum(InUse) as TotalInUse sum(Available) as TotalAvailable | eval pctUsed=( TotalInUse/TotalAvailable ) * 100 | eval count=round(pctUsed,2) | eval classvalue="percent"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.group: License Usage over Time by Product
module.param: | search InUse>0 | timechart latest(InUse) earliest(InUse) as junk_* by Product | `remove_junk`

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.group: License Usage (Percentage) over Time by Product
module.param: | search InUse_pct>0 | timechart latest(InUse_pct) earliest(InUse_pct) as junk_InUse_pct by Product | `remove_junk`

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | stats latest(Installed) as Installed latest(Available) as Available latest(InUse_pct) as InUse_pct latest(Type) as Type earliest(*) as junk_* by InUse Product | `remove_junk` | table Product InUse InUse_pct Available Type | rename InUse as "In Use" InUse_pct as "In Use (Percent)"
